apis.name: Get links
apis.description: Get assets as links from a Release.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: tag_name
attributes.description: The tag associated with the Release.

apis.name: Get a link
apis.description: Get an asset as a link from a Release.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: tag_name
attributes.description: The tag associated with the Release.

attributes.name: link_id
attributes.description: The ID of the link.

apis.name: Create a link
apis.description: Create an asset as a link from a Release.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: tag_name
attributes.description: The tag associated with the Release.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the link. Link names must be unique within the release.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: The URL of the link. Link URLs must be unique within the release.

attributes.name: filepath
attributes.description: Optional path for a Direct Asset link.

attributes.name: link_type
attributes.description: The type of the link: other, runbook, image, package. Defaults to other.

apis.name: Update a link
apis.description: Update an asset as a link from a Release.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: tag_name
attributes.description: The tag associated with the Release.

attributes.name: link_id
attributes.description: The ID of the link.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the link.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: The URL of the link.

attributes.name: filepath
attributes.description: Optional path for a Direct Asset link.

attributes.name: link_type
attributes.description: The type of the link: other, runbook, image, package. Defaults to other.

apis.name: Delete a link
apis.description: Delete an asset as a link from a Release.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: tag_name
attributes.description: The tag associated with the Release.

attributes.name: link_id
attributes.description: The ID of the link.
